attributes.action: Defining with greater clarity the rights and duties of citizens on the web
attributes.additional_details: Defining with greater clarity and objectivity the rights and duties of citizens on the Internet at the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UKGBNI).
attributes.background:
Better define rights on the web.

1) Innovation and creation
2) Data and communication privacy
3) Freedom of Expression
4) Internet quality
5) Consumer Law
6) Intellectual Property.

Proposal will be valid throughout the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (UKGBNI).

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Your petition lists a number of themes, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
